version.desc: Prints just the compiler's version and exits.

desc: Optimizes the module. Also accepts the optimize level:

optimizeLevel.desc: How much to focus on optimizing code. [0-3]

shrinkLevel.desc: How much to focus on shrinking code size. [0-2, s=1, z=2]

validate.desc: Validates the module using Binaryen. Exits if invalid.

baseDir.desc: Specifies the base directory of input and output files.

outFile.desc: Specifies the output file. File extension indicates format.

desc: Enables source map generation. Optionally takes the URL
used to reference the source map from the binary file.

noDebug.desc: Disables maintaining of debug information in binaries.

noAssert.desc: Replaces assertions with just their value without trapping.

noEmit.desc: Performs compilation as usual but does not emit code.

noMemory.desc: Does not set up a memory. Useful for low-level WebAssembly.

memoryBase.desc: Sets the start offset of compiler-generated static memory.

noLib.desc: Does not include the shipped standard library.

desc: Adds one or multiple paths to custom library components and
uses exports of all top-level files at this path as globals.
Sets the trap mode to use.
allow  Allow trapping operations. This is the default.
clamp  Replace trapping operations with clamping semantics.
js     Replace trapping operations with JS semantics.
Specifies additional Binaryen passes to run after other

measure.desc: Prints measuring information on I/O and compile times.
